website_summaries.verdict: 100% virgin Brazilian human hair with a gorgeous wave pattern that seems to last after washings and extended months of wearing.
pros: Can be dyed, permed, bleached, highlighted, curled, or styled as your own hair
Double machine wefts, with plenty of elasticity
cons: Full bundles, but could be a lot thicker
May be hard to curl and some ends could burn when using a curling iron

customer_reviews.title: Decent hair for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very soft hair; doesn’t tangle. My only issue was the body wave hair not keeping the natural curls, which isn’t all that bad because I wand curl my hair often.
customer_reviews.author: Tyra Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive my package, I haven’t had an installation in a long time so I was anxious to see what the hair was like and my when I tell you it was popping! No stiffness, No Fly Aways & I’ve had it in for a week now NO SHEDDING! Great choice of hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kasaa

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful hair
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair. I made a wig . It is nice in soft ! It do not shed . I haven’t had any problems with this hair . I high recommend this hair for purchase
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Hair !
customer_reviews.text: I love this hair I got it and used it for my channel to do a tutorial on and the hair color stayed on pretty good . I’m in love to be honest lol I have bleached it 3 times and it is still nice wow !!! If you want to watch a full review from me check out my channel at lexees.beauty.blog ! I’m in love !
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Good quality hair for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 5 of these wigs for my clients. They are absolutely beautiful. The hair is a natural color. It is so soft. The waves are very bouncy and keep their shape well. The lace is very thin and is a good color to make blending look natural. Many different options for parting as well. Will definitely order again soon!
customer_reviews.author: SMRH

customer_reviews.title: Wig Review
customer_reviews.text: I really like this wig! This wig came with 2 packs of lashes that are bomb as well. It was super easy for me to bleach my knots and pluck my wig because it came preplucked. The hair is really soft and I am not lying when I say it doesn’t have a bad smell at all!!! I don’t any shedding either. I just wish it was a little thicker but it’s the summertime so I don’t mind at all. They also have 180 and 200 density if you prefer it to be thicker. This wig was 150 Density.
customer_reviews.author: Shaneka

customer_reviews.title: Great hair
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing human hair wigs all over the internet and hair supply stores they have been trash spending hundreds and thousands of dollars on these products. This is my first time ordering from QTHair and when I received the wig it was the best I ever purchased from anywhere. Good quality hair just beautiful I hurried and ordered another one! If I could afford I would purchase more. Thank God I found a company that’s not selling trash and hair at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Onefivestardiva

customer_reviews.title: Hair not long like I thought
customer_reviews.text: I just order another wig it said I'll receive it by Saturday I needed it by Sunday I'm sending the other o got today back it said a 20inch but it's like 16 inches it's not true to length I got both through my Amazon the new wig I ordered was 26inch hopefully its true to length I really love your hair I bought a couple of times but of the qthair wed site if it's not I'll send it back ok hopefully this time I'm satisfied I got a 4by4 i wanted a clouse but was scared to buy it cause of the length thank u for your help
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great Bundles
customer_reviews.text: I love the hair very soft , not tangly and swings lovely . Thank you ❤️ Happy client
customer_reviews.author: Zakaree Malone

customer_reviews.title: MUST 👏🏾 BUY 👏🏾THIS 👏🏾HAIR !!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best hair I’ve received EVER so far for this price. A MUST BUY!!!!! The first picture is the day after my first instal. Second picture is ONE MONTH later. Very little to NO SHEDDING, NO harsh smell, or tangling. Takes color and holds curl very well. No Thinning and the closure was PRE PLUCKED. Will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeniqua

customer_reviews.title: Great hair and frontal
customer_reviews.text: I received my order by eta given. Only thing I didn’t like was that I had to order my frontal separate because there was no bundle and frontal deals with the inches I wanted. So I received the frontal one day and the bundles the next. Other than that everything is great! The hair has no smell, true to texture and length. I have since bleached and dyed the hair. Curls remained the same. I haven’t had a chance to make my wig because the hair and frontal came separate. Plus I work so once I do I’ll post pics.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.text: This hair is soooo gorgeous! From unboxing to install, I have been able to run my fingers through it with no shedding or tangles. Hair has no smell and was beautifully packaged. True to length and very thick bundles, I only used 2 of them! And to top it off very great customer service from when I placed the order to delivery with great tips! Will be ordering from company again!
customer_reviews.author: Kadijah

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, no shedding. :-)
customer_reviews.text: The best online hair purchase. I’m extremely happy with this purchase and would definitely buy it again. It lasted a great length of time, it washes and recovery’s well and it had little to no shedding. Could have been reused.
customer_reviews.author: Mama-to-a-Gem

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhmazzinnngggg Hair!!!
customer_reviews.text: This hair is everything! The wave pattern is beautiful. For the first week it did not tangle or shed AT ALL. Now I’m getting a little tangling BUT no matting which is AWESOME! The closure bleaches really well and there is very little need to pluck the part. It lays so flat and look super natural. There are no scraggly ends what so ever! I will order this hair again and again. Ps it holds a beautiful curl when you use flexi rods!
customer_reviews.author: Rylynn

customer_reviews.title: This hair is FREAKIN BEAUTIFUL!!!
customer_reviews.text: This hair is FREAKING gorgeous!!! The bundles are thick!! The hair smells good and is super soft!! The quality is at least 8a or better!! I was researching this hair seller for about 3 days. Read a ton of reviews and decided to go ahead and order. Shipping was super fast and the seller checked with me to ensure my package was there and intact! This hair is INSANELY good for the price!! I will be buying from this seller ONLY for now!!! Im as super pleased!! I had 3 beauticians look at this hair and they were equally impressed!! Ive given this link out about 7 times today from pictures I posted of this hair!! Its soooo worth it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Arlin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great hair will be buying again! Purchased the 20 22 24 26 inch body wave. Hair is full only used three bundles for this fullness. Love this hair. Has been installed over a week and feels as if it is brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Ajadae Williams

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: It has been a little over two weeks since I got my hair installed. On today, it was washed and colored... Omg, this hair is outstanding. I have tried a number of different brands over the years and paid a lot of money for my hair. This is one of the best brands I have purchased. I will be purchasing again very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Nita

customer_reviews.title: The best hair ever!
customer_reviews.text: I really love the product and have gotten a lot of compliments on my hair. It’s super soft and does not shed or tangle.
customer_reviews.author: TayaniSamyra

customer_reviews.title: This hair is GOOD HAIR.....!!!
customer_reviews.text: This hair is amazing. I’ve gone through so much just trying to get good quality hair. It’s been so stressful n dreadful. I vowed never to buy anymore “bundles” until I went out on a limb and purchased from here... ✅ passed the “nappy neck test” 😂😂🤟🏽 ✅ passed the tangle test ✅ passed the smell test ✅ passed the shedding test ((minimum shedding but not clumps of hair or balding/ shedding frontal)) ✅ passed the dye test ✅ passed the ((I didn’t tie my hair up last night test)) I woke up with no tangles or matting ✅ holds curl well 💕 Seller was nice and responsive and answered every single question I had. Will def be ordering more
customer_reviews.author: Lunny bunny 💎💎💎

customer_reviews.title: Update review on bundles
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this hair. This is the second time I've purchased bundles from Qthair and I left the install in both times for 2 months. As long as you maintain the hair as instructed it will last for a long time. I'm still able to use the bundles again and plan on doing a reinstall. Also, the bundles are a very good size. I o my had to use 2 1/2 packs each time and I order 4 the first time and 3 the second time.
customer_reviews.author: Keak Wynne

customer_reviews.title: Worst hair I ever had
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening the bix the first thing i noticed were the ends. They were dry and looked like split ends. I recieved march 3 but im just now installing it. I cowashed the hair thinking the ends would look somewhat better but they dont. The hair is dry and nappy. It was a waste of money. Maybe my hair was a bad batch but it was not good quality at all. PS the bundles are thin and have split ENDS. I am so so disappointed i returned it today cant wait for my refund
customer_reviews.author: Yana

customer_reviews.title: BUT it is holding up better than some of my more expensive hair has
customer_reviews.text: I must say this hair truly surprised me! I normally spend hundreds of dollars on hair so of course I didn't expect much to come out of this hair being so inexpensive. BUT it is holding up better than some of my more expensive hair has. I got a pronto with it this time but next time I will do a sew in! No smell..No shedding...Curls great.. Straightens easily! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: maranda j.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to ask for your correct size they have QTHair has different sizes, there was no shedding hair was super soft and super stylish i highly suggest professional installation for a better outcome than mine because it has the potential for any hair style and its worth way more than the price
customer_reviews.author: Sparkle

customer_reviews.title: Shreds Don’t buy.
customer_reviews.text: The hair seemed very soft and nice when I first got it but after washing and installing it, it looked as felt like a birds nest a week later. My closure completely bald out. Like it looked as if I was going bald. I am very disappointed in this hair. It stated it was 10a grade it felt more like 5a grade. This is false advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Anedra

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Second time I buy this hair. It really worth the price. I think its the best hair I ever purchase. Well package and fast delivery!! I will be buying more soon! Thanks for the gift!
customer_reviews.author: Edwilza P.

customer_reviews.title: Great hair!
customer_reviews.text: This hair is amazing. I originally ordered it and a closure (from another company) to make a wig, but due to Hairstylists cancelling on me, my little sister did a sew in with these bundles for me. The pics are from my trip to Cali. This hair is amazing! I have had it in for five days now. It doesn’t shed (all hair sheds, but I mean nothing crazy) and it doesn’t tangle although it’s curly. It crazy because I ALWAYS go for straight hair. This hair is amazing and I will be purchasing some more to make wigs for my birthday in March! Follow me on Instagram @chefjayamber
customer_reviews.author: Daphane Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Hair is Just Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Hair for my girlfriend; it’s totally perfect and she totally Loves it. It’s soft and it’s texture is beyond beautiful. This Hair Quality is beyond words
customer_reviews.author: Larry Adams

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: Not good hair! Poor quality, gets tangled easily, lots of shedding! First time ordering hair on amazon bc I was rushing and being cheap lol but I had to do A LOT to keep it up. I’ve kept up with good quality hair for year past the expected lifetime, so I know how to take care of hair... but this one was going against every trick I tried. Definitely won’t be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: TiyMone

customer_reviews.title: Dont Do It
customer_reviews.text: Just got it today and returning it tomorrow, I purchased a 18inch 150% density preplucked lace wig. The wig is true to length and the hair is soft. But that's where it stops, it has several mixed lengths in it making the hair look very ratty. It also is NOT 150% density, its literally 1 bundle and a closer. You gotta be kinding me.. Bye Felisha.. on her way back, just a waste of my time. I needed this for a new job..Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Sjohn

customer_reviews.title: 360 Frontal Wig
customer_reviews.text: First off, let me just say I order from a lot of vendors on Amazon and AliExpress and this is by the far THE BEST hair I have come a crossed so far. The hair is SOFT! No smell, I got the wig installed and have been getting compliments since. Definitely will be ordering from QT again!
customer_reviews.author: Makayla

customer_reviews.title: Really soft hair
customer_reviews.text: Hi, So I this is my second purchase and I love the quality and price of the hair. So I had to buy it for my lil sister! She loves it!! I’ll definitely be ordering again. Also I bleached this hair and had it made into a wig and I love it in the third picture.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Domonique Ross

customer_reviews.title: I'm being honest♥️🌺
customer_reviews.text: I love the lace on this wig! The hair texture is great and it smells good. I will definitely be ordering this unit again!.
customer_reviews.author: Imana.

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS NOT HUMAN HAIR!
customer_reviews.text: Received a refund. It looked and felt beautiful upon arrival but after the install I realized this definitely was not human hair. I am not a weave fanatic but I know good quality hair and this was not it. The curl pattern was gone after a month and the hair dried out easily. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: I*Belong*2*Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Now it's shedding horribly. The quality is really low
customer_reviews.text: The customer service is good. They will try to help you. This is not virgin hair! I had a professional hairdresser dye it and she said it took 5 bleachings just to dye it a little blue. Now it's shedding horribly. The quality is really low. I WOULD NOT recommend this hair. Good luck if you do.
customer_reviews.author: Sooooo

customer_reviews.title: Soft beautiful hair
customer_reviews.text: Updated review: the seller made it right. I am now pleased with this transaction. Excellent service!!! I guess I received a bad batch the first time, but the follow up hair was soft and beautiful! Original review: I bought this based on the good reviews and maybe I got a bad batch but this was not 100% unprocessed human hair. This was definitely a human hair/synthetic blend. As soon as I went to cowash it, it started matting & tangling like crazy. This was simply WATER...no shampoo or conditioner was added. I immediately packed it right back in That Amazon bag and started the return process. Not pleased at all. Now I'm scrambling to find hair in time for Easter!
customer_reviews.author: N. Logan

customer_reviews.title: Great hair! Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: When I received my Brazilian body wave from QTHair I was excited. It is nice, soft, hair that didn't smell. Lots of body. I am also impressed with their customer service. They go above and beyond to help a customer. Will buy from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: Nynikki718

customer_reviews.title: Worse wig
customer_reviews.text: I worn the wig once and wash it . I couldn’t comb it out it was hard to comb . No hair on lace bald spot all over the lace plus I flat iron the hair and it was like it was melting like it mixed hair this is not 100% human don’t buy I always buy wigs from amazon this is my first bad worse Experience I just be trying different ppl I be trying to support all venders 👎🏽
customer_reviews.author: jamel

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this wig twice and I returned the first one thinking the second one was going to be better but no it is worst. It is as if a child took a scissors to it, if you are selling this for $105 the least you can do is make it look decent, the only reason I cannot return this is because I need something for school on Monday and a new one will not arrive till at least Wednesday, now I have waste money to buy another one. I was going to make a YouTube video about it, well I’m still making it only I am changing the title to companies you should not buy wigs from on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Not again
customer_reviews.text: In the past I have ordered this hair before. Surprise not the same standards...hair smelled bad, lots of things I had to pick out of hair ( string, lent of some sort, and other things attach to hair). After wash fizzy at the ends and the length was off. Not happy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Soft
customer_reviews.text: I’m Very Picky When It Comes To My Hair And I Had This Wig Styled & Touched Up 4 Different Times.... I Love This Wig Would Buy It Over & Over & Over AGAIN ❣️
customer_reviews.author: TIARA TAYLOR

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Simply amazing hair! It colored easily and maintained its softness and luster! The price was economical for three bundles. I love this hair and will be ordering it again!
customer_reviews.author: Helpful Hand

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: So am back with my update. I couldn’t recommend anyone to buy this hair, am sorry. The frontal is trash, it has a very bad smell ( fishy smell) that I have washed it three times and it has refused to get out. It’s shades like crazy. I feel like i wasted money, can never buy again. Very disappointed. Please please don’t buy the frontal it’s the worst frontal ever as it tangled that the hair started to come out from the inside out of the frontal that I couldn’t even comb it.plus it doesn’t hold in curls
customer_reviews.author: patricia Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Very bad
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend it at all. the tip comes very empty. I had to cut it out. and in the end I was very short. very dissatisfied It was not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: I must say i absolutely love this hair. No complaints at all! Will forever order hair from you all. Customer service went out their way to make sure i received my hair on time & messaged me to make sure i was satisfied with my producted. I got 16' 18' and 20'. Thank you! Will update a week or 2 from now. But this is day 3 and i absolutely love it. Took 2 days to arrive. Got hair installed the next day with a leave out middle part.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT HAIR ESPECIALLY FOR THE PRICE!!
customer_reviews.text: I usually purchase my hair from the more expensive hair company’s online. I was looking for a more affordable often because I usually don’t keep my hair up that long and I’m so glad I gave this company a try! I pre-washed the hair before install and it still held it’s shine and bounce afterwards. I’ve been to the gym and everything and it still holds a nice curl! There’s some shedding but it’s very minor. I will purchase this hair again!! I bought the 16/18/20/22 and only use three bundles. The hair is super thick, I could have gotten away with only two bundles.
customer_reviews.author: shada

customer_reviews.title: Second time ordering this hair!!
customer_reviews.text: I always dye this hair, it takes dye really good. I dyed it brown but it comes red in sun or it’s bright brown. I love it. Hair is soft, can curl or flat iron. I recommend curl rods for curls to last. This my 2bd time ordering it and it done me right ❤️🙌🏾
customer_reviews.author: D'Asia

customer_reviews.title: Good hair... But not body wave
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 20, 22, & 24 with a 18 closure. It's been 2 weeks and so far so good. Minimal shedding. I didn't bleach it, even though I was dying to, because even with the best hair it breaks off and I really wanted the length. I'm 5'11 and its right at the bottom of back... Perfect. The con is that it's not body wave in its natural state... It's straight... That was disappointing. One pic is with the curing rod and the other is after a wash in its natural state.
customer_reviews.author: L. M. McIntosh

customer_reviews.title: Great hair!
customer_reviews.text: Order this hair for my graduation pictures and I loved it. Great quality and hair maintained its softness and body even after adding heat and washing. Definitely will order again
customer_reviews.author: Chan-Erica

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It will work. This hair is very thin and sorta tangly. Lots of broken strands. Especially at the ends. The lace was pretty good. this was a professional installation so of course that made a huge difference. The cap size is a bit big on me but my head is on the small sized so I’d say it’s average. This hair was curled an hr ago and the curls are Nearly gone and it’s October. I’m gonna try to flexi rod. I’m gonna hv to make it work but I wouldn’t purchase again. Over all I guess it’s ok for the price. This is an 18” frontal wig.
customer_reviews.author: Mahogany Wren

customer_reviews.title: Bundles was thin and harsh. Honest review
customer_reviews.text: I am a avid wig and weave buyer . I love lace wigs so i was excited about this from reviews. But i learned alot of the reviews were paid not actual real reviews. I never colored the hair or even applied heat and bundles felt like they were mixed with synthetic hair. They are not full bundles as well, it was pretty much half bundles not 4oz
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Nikkii

customer_reviews.title: Great first buy
customer_reviews.text: Detroit MI- bought the 20in. first time buying hair off of Amazon. First 360 lace wig. So like everyone else I look at reviews, ratings, and how many people purchased the hair. Very soft. Holds curls. My stylist like the hair. The cap has combs and the adjustable strap. Came with a net cap and lashes. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: chopkins

customer_reviews.title: i was surprised !
customer_reviews.text: This hair is not bad at alll , shipping took 2 days i believe , holds curls VERY well .. i did a little plucking and bleaching and i love the outcome ! no smell on the hair when it was shipped i washed the hair & it became so thick & full , and parting space is greatt , i definitely will be ordering again ☺️
customer_reviews.author: Naya

customer_reviews.title: Not Virgin Hair
customer_reviews.text: False Advertisement!!!! This hair tangles and sheds like crazy...its also is difficult to curl and some parts burn on your iron.
customer_reviews.author: KAY

customer_reviews.title: Comp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because of the reviews. I got the package today and there was a single small bundle stuffed into a little yellow bag. There should have been 4 thick bundles. I promptly returned it. Complete and total waste of my time. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful hair, no shedding
customer_reviews.text: This hair is great. It came in one day. I put highlights in it and it took with no problem. I did have a little shedding when washing. Once styled I had NO SHEDDING OR TANGLES. The hair is soft and full of body. Doesn’t look dry. I’m surprised at the lace, because it was looking a little grey at first. But it blends perfectly when you use lace tint. The only issue is that it is thin!! I had to add about half a bundle of hair to make it a true 150% natural density. But for the price I will DEFINTELY order again
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I just installed this hair myself and I'm very impressed by the quality of the hair. It's very soft no weird smell very little shedding as expected even your own hair sheds. The hair coloured well and it curls well. I will update this review to really see how they last for the month. I got 18 20 22 24 and I didnt need all 4 but I use all because I like a full head. The only thing I would say is the 24 is a little thin on the ends but the longer the thinner bundles usually is. I will surely be buying again. Thank you QTHAIR. 🤗👌 p.s price is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Roch

customer_reviews.title: Thanks! The Best Hair I've Ever Had!
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love This Hair It's Very Soft The Bundles Are Full. I've Gotten Sooo Many Compliments. By Far The Best! Definitely A Good Vendor. I'm Sooo Happy I Chose This Vendor. I'm So Happy With My Hair❤❤!
customer_reviews.author: Shamika Smith

customer_reviews.title: Just get the hair it is awesome!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the 4 bundle pack and got the 22,24,26,28 inches. Inordered same day shipping and it came same day. Inwas extremely happy because I leave for vacation the next day. Life saver!!!! I didn't use all the bundles and I have a big head lol. The hair was enough and full throughout. Waves were from top to bottom not like others I've bought in the past where wavy only halfway through. Got it installed with a 5x5 HD closure @hairbyshen (Tell her Jamie sent ya 😉) Overall the hair and customer service was excellent. No shedding nor tangling and hair did not have a bad smell. Thank you very much to the company for the excellent hait and service.
customer_reviews.author: Carebear

customer_reviews.title: Sheds A lot & doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Giving this hair 1 star because it sheds soooooo much!!! would not recommend for a weave. I kept it in for only 1 month and by week 3 it was already shedding like crazy! Hand full of hair left in the brush or comb every time I would brush it. It’s soft and looks really good for 3 weeks then starts shedding. It doesn’t hold a curl. Curls would last maybe 4 hours even with a lot of hairspray. I wore it straight mostly because I got tired of curling my hair everyday to keep the body wave look.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: All the good reviews made me think that I was really going to get some good hair. I’ve had this hair made into a wig and I wish I never bought it. This hair is a frizzy mess. I’ve only had it for 3 days but it looks like it’s my third install and that I’ve been sleeping in it every night. Pack hair from the beauty supply store doesn’t even look this bad this fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jess C.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Hair Bundles
customer_reviews.text: This hair is excellent. It’s super silky and soft and holds a curl really well. I didn’t experience problems with tangling or shedding and there was no funny smell right out of the package. The hair also came with some cute little goodies which were a hair net, pair of eyelashes, and some hair care instructions. I wore this hair in a half up half down quick weave twice then I made it into a wig and cut it. The wefts are very well made because they didn’t fall apart even after washing glue out of them multiple times. I would definitely buy this hair again.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great hair choice!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered the 18, 20, 22, 24 inch bundles and couldn't be more happy. This is some great hair and I never ever do the reviews but I had to and they haven't asked me to just volunteered. I used this hair for my wedding so you known it's some good hair and today it has been 2 weeks from wedding day and hair still is soft, curly and I haven't curled since wedding day. So yes order this hair you won't be disappointed. And it came in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Temekia Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: I’ll definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.text: REVIVED AND BEAUTIFUL! If you ever have an issue with the hair needing to be revived you just need to condition with Silicon brand conditioner and it comes right back to life! I’ve now had this wig for maybe a month or so, I’ve bleached the knots, bleached the hair and dyed it! It holds curls well too!!
customer_reviews.author: Chania

customer_reviews.title: Pretty disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The hair is really soft I’ll give that. But the shedding is ridiculous. It can tangle pretty quickly and the hair gets everywhere ! I went to visit a friend over the weekend and he told me he had to get up so much hair it was everywhere, he could ball it up in a big hair ball . How embarrassing ! Also it made my hair itch so bad I’ve never had a problem with bundles like that before. So I didn’t keep my sew-in 2 full weeks. If you want a quick look for like a Photo shoot , weekend or something then you shouldn’t worry. But this hair is not for everyday !
customer_reviews.author: T Lyles

customer_reviews.title: Hair wasnt worth price
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this hair was horrible, from the shedding to it being so thin. Even at the low price that its currently being sold at, its STILL not worth the money. I regretted buying this hair from the moment I opened the package and ran my fingers through it. will not be buying from this vendor again.. save your money and shop elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Kaliyah

customer_reviews.title: Trash hair , don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Honestly probably the worst hair I’ve ever purchased off amazon. So the hair out of the package already was bad. I did a sew in that took hours and it looked so bad because the hair was trash. It reminds me of hair that you’ve already warn for months that you should throw out. I took out my install and did clips instead because I had somewhere to go and the hair was just so bulky and not in a good way. It got worse after I washed it. Find a different brand to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Buy this hair!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The customer service is amazing they helped me every step of the way, the hair is also verrry soft and holds a good curl!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Quatesha williams

customer_reviews.title: Great bundles at an affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 12A QT 26x2 bundles. It came very fast, two days to be exact. No smell and it was very soft. It presses out well, has a nice luster to it and holds a duel fairly well. I’ve had the hair in about a week so far and I have no complaints. Definitely try this hair y’all!
customer_reviews.author: Johari E.

customer_reviews.title: Super thick and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Looove the body on this hair! Straightens super straight but keeps its fullness! Barely any smell! I’ve only had it in a few days so this is more of an initial review.. but so far so good! The closure is from a different company btw Update: so far the hair is still great but as others stated doesn’t have much of a wave to it in its natural state. It super full when straightened or curled tho so I don’t mind
customer_reviews.author: Simae Rose

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The hair is soft. And pretty thick frok root to end. My only issue was that it came with some stuff stuck in it. I'm not sure what it was. And it came out when u pulled it out. But it was kinda like pieces of cardboard or somethihg stuck to the strains of hair. And there was alot of it. But after I got it all cleaned out I love the closure
customer_reviews.author: Kendra spurling

customer_reviews.title: Great Hair
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love this hair I got it installed today and it's so fine and good it wouldn't hold my curls I finally found some good hair I think I will have it for months I got 4 bundles the hair is not really thick but it's really silky I give the Vendor a big Compliment I'm so happy omg I bleached the hair and it took the color immediately I will give a update in a few weeks hopefully the texture reamains the same
customer_reviews.author: shavada

customer_reviews.title: I absolutly Love this hair
customer_reviews.text: I absolutly Love this hair !! These bundles are soft and full of body!! It’s completly easy to press & curl and flat iron. From the shipping to the packaging and the quality of hair it was worth the buy. If you’re looking for affordable hair and want to look flawless QTHAIR is for you! 😘
customer_reviews.author: Mrzpineapple

customer_reviews.title: Terrible hair
customer_reviews.text: This hair is terrible!! You guys they will contact you if you leave a bad review and tell you to keep the money and delete the review and that’s fine but don’t even waste your time with this hair it feels like baby doll hair after the first wash.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: No Scare Online Hair
customer_reviews.text: No shedding or tangled I purposely waited three days before writing this because I had already purchased and returned hair from another company but I received fast shipping a few little gifts and great quality hair I will update on how it does with salt water but in land and dry the hair curls easily but since it all natural without hair products it doesn’t stay long but I do love it it’s was worth the money hopefully the curly hair is just as good if not better
customer_reviews.author: Mr.&Mrs. Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Great Hair
customer_reviews.text: My first time buying hair from amazon and this brand is a good brand. I had the hair installed once I got it. Little to no shedding. I wore it straight and curly. Takes heat well and the curls stays. I think it’s been more than six months. Since I bought it. I just washed it since I took it out. And it’s back to life. Flowy, wavy, bouncy, and shiny. I use off name brand shampoo and conditioner. Nothing special. I do in planning to reinstalling my hair soon but as a u part wig. I didn’t buy the closure so idk about them. But the bundles are great.
customer_reviews.author: Riah

customer_reviews.title: Great quality hair
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love this hair it’s so soft n barely sheds it feels so nice !! I had in in for 2 weeks a already and it still soft no knotting or dryness split ends just beautiful quality hair This hair is better then most of the hair I purchased from other vendors I found my new go to hair .. I was very skeptical about buying hair off amazon but I decided to give it a try cause of all the positive reviews I saw and the reviews speak for themselves this hair is great if ur skeptical about it just buy it u won’t regret it ! Thank me later I will definitely b buying again ..
customer_reviews.author: Nadine mari

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISSATISFIED
customer_reviews.text: I was excited when I received this hair within 3 days of purchase. I don’t wear a lot of wigs but due to the shops being closed I decided to give it a try. I did a lot of searching and based on the reviews I decided to get this one. I must express how disappointed I am. This hair is VERY thin, it doesn’t hold a curl, it’s not true to its description. The hair is soft without smell, but outside of wearing it in a ponytail, I can’t do anything else with it. I will NOT purchase again and I don’t recommend
customer_reviews.author: Regina King

customer_reviews.title: Bundles
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the hair is very thing and shedding a lot I do not like it
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: This Not Human Hair, But Decent For Short-Term Wear
customer_reviews.text: I do not think this is Human Hair, but it can be a great temporary or short-term piece. There are lots of stray colored strings throughout this piece. Also, the hair does not color well. I attempted lightening three times with no success.
customer_reviews.author: I Love Bling 72

customer_reviews.title: Great quality hair
customer_reviews.text: I colored and made a wig with this hair. I have 18,20,22 with a closure in body wave. Straightens well also. I absolutely love this hair.
customer_reviews.author: amelia dow

customer_reviews.title: Worth every dime
customer_reviews.text: Totally love this hair way better than I expected it’s true what they say that you get what you pay for I got three bundles all 26 inches cost me about $200. I had it professionally installed in styled it’s been about a week now and I have no complaints. Very minimal shedding no tingling whatsoever The only drawback is that I bleach the hair and the color barely lift it I was left kind of orange Auburn color even after bleaching it twice other than that perfect
customer_reviews.author: Michelle r Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love This Hair! Buying Again Soon!
customer_reviews.text: This hair is very nice! I’ve had it in for a while and to keep it wavy at times I’ll put it in two braids and sleep in them! Spray with water and use a detangle type brush and this hair continues to look great. Had a slight smell out the bag at first but goes away especially after a wash. Didn’t even have to use all the hair and it was still very soft & full! Light shedding after a while, just like natural hair. Will be buying again :)
customer_reviews.author: Chelsie price

customer_reviews.title: Bomb
customer_reviews.text: This hair is the bomb.com Follow me at hairlegacy101_ or _prettyonpurpose_
customer_reviews.author: Cheris C.

customer_reviews.title: Hair length is not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Not even close to 10 inches. Measured from three different sections and its Barely 8 inches
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good hair
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality hair. I’m not a weave person and this was my first time purchasing hair...it meet my expectations. The hair looses its fullness after the first wash. It holds curls well. It does have a slight odor that I couldn’t seem to wash out...I haven’t had any issues with shedding, tangling or matting. You do have to shampoo it often... I believe it is recommended to shampoo twice a week. I have the hair for now over a month and it still does well.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Miller

customer_reviews.title: Awful product.  Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: The reviews were so great, but this wig was awful. While the front of the wig was the length I selected, it was 2 inches shorter in the back. The ends are extremely thin. There was a lot of lint in the hair. The wig was poorly made. There is a patch of fly aways at the top that continuously stick up no matter what you used to slick it down. Waste of money. Although it felt like a good quality of hair, the wig was absolute trash. Will not buy again. I would give no stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. T

customer_reviews.title: Get it!!!! It’s worth it
customer_reviews.text: The hair is great! I received the package on time, bleached it then soaked it in some shampoo and conditioner for 2+ hours and the hair was extremely soft! It was soft when I received it but it was even softer and the hair took the bleach extremely well. This hair barely sheds and I have received so many compliments. I am honestly surprised at its quality for an Amazon product. I gave it a 3 star for presentation because the hair came really frizzy. The team is very responsive and showed great concern for my frizzy hair compliant and gave me a solution . They really care about their reputation and giving QUALITY hair, will definitely come back again!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shaky

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the four bundles of 16,18,20,22 unfortunately I didnt get to add in the fourth bundle to my sew in bc I did want a fuller look but for the price its great! I have straightened and curled the hair no problems there. As far as shedding its nothing outta the ordinary it anything it sheds less than hair that I have purchased before from other vendors but anyhow GREAT GREAT GREAT! IF you want a full look definitely add the fourth bundle to your sew in or wig!
customer_reviews.author: Shary

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality Silky Hair
customer_reviews.text: The Lace is abundant, the Cap is a nice size. I can fit my locs underneath this Wig. The color of the Lace melts in your skin. The Hair is luxurious Raw and unprocessed. The hair in the front of the wig seems slightly shorter than the back, but when you flat Iron it, the Hair stretches long. The Wig does originally have a wavy texture. I love QT Hair and I would order from them again 🔥🔥🔥🔥🤟🏾
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The hair is shiny and doesn't really blend with my hair. It also tangles, sheds, and has a slight smell (luckily not the corn chip smell). I probably won't keep it in long because I'm not satisfied with the hair. I guess you get what you pay for..
customer_reviews.author: Niki M

customer_reviews.title: It was USED
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this closure and it has clearly been used. literally still has thread and concealer on it. I don’t even think it was washed for that matter!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor M

customer_reviews.title: Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this wig. It’s absolutely beautiful. I didn’t do much of anything to it. It is 16 inches feels like 18. Definitely buy this product. You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great Beautiful Hair
customer_reviews.text: Great Beautiful Hair. Non tangling. & very full down to the ends. I Love it. Already purchased a second batch for a deeper wavier curl pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Donnie Smith

customer_reviews.title: OK. Not true to length by any means. Average.
customer_reviews.text: If you need someone cheap This will work. The hair packs I bought were enough to make a half wig and have 1 pack left over. You will have to cut it shorter because the hair is mot true to length. And its thin at the ends. But its ok.
customer_reviews.author: V-Texx Group

customer_reviews.title: Good Frontal and Bundles
customer_reviews.text: I think the hair is amazing . It is soft and full . Would definitely buy from you guys again . I will do update in a couple of weeks . Thanks again QT hair ! Updated : Hair is still holding up !
customer_reviews.author: BabygirlQK

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for a wig online
customer_reviews.text: Full of body and soft. I love that it came with an adjustable band. I like the wig for the value for the money. The length is growing on me I usually go for very long hair that is past waist length. So far I am happy. I would say buy this wig because it's a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cost efficient good quality hair ...BUY...BUY...BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: First off I would say this hair is worth the amount especially for 4 bundles. The hair is great and versatile, the body wave pattern was excellent and it straightened really good and also crimped nicely the length is accurate and out of the 4 bundles I was able to achieve this look with 3 bundles. I will say it does shed but what hair doesn’t🤷🏾‍♀️ Very thick bundles which surprised me but it’s great. I haven’t tried to color it just yet I will soon and will upload updated pictures...BUY...BUY...BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lia

customer_reviews.title: OVERALL: it’s okay.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 16’, 18’, and 20’. The hair is true to length, and it didn’t smell too bad. It holds a curl really good, and you can get the hair bone straight. My only problem with the hair is, it sheds. Like ALOT!! Now I know hair sheds, and usually I don’t mind it, but this hair was shedding wayyy too much. Overall thought the hair was okay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The hair was nice , I bleached the knots and the front of unit for a different look. But overall great unit Update : this unit hello curls for a week or longer I put flex rods in overnight . I would purchased another unit from seller Instagram - whoiskim.b
customer_reviews.author: Kim b

customer_reviews.title: Idk
customer_reviews.text: This wig is nothing like the picture, but the hair was super soft and thick. I don’t not like the lace or the hairline on this one I’ve plucked it and it doesn’t seem to make it look better. It just doesn’t look real natural unless I put it to the side and poof it up. But I don’t like the frontal at all but the hair qua is good so I keep it for messy hair looks when I want to take pictures 🤷🏾‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Buzz

Double Machine Weft,Tight & Neat,No Shedding,No Tangles,No Lices Full, Thick, Soft,Shiny & Bouncy with Highest Elasticity
